Text: Thank you very much "tiut2500"!  These are very high quality videos and much more convenient than downloading them one by one like others upload.  I downloaded your previous volumes, but I have to say that I probably do prefer you releasing them month by month because they will be smaller and more frequent.  The Volume 1 from 2013 has Jan, Feb, and March, but this torrent April is the new upload, am I correct?  Again thank you very much, I appreciate the hard work and keep them coming, every month if you can :)

Also, can you seed for awhile tiut2500, especially this one as there is only 1 seeder and some of the other have zero.  After I reach 100% I can take over the seeding duties until more have it, Thanks!
